about_the_game:
Summerhill is a story-driven puzzle adventure game in which you play as a young shepherd and their dog. Rescue your sheep, bond with your faithful dog, and delve into the mysterious, long-forgotten world that lies beyond the borders of home.

From the BAFTA-nominated development team behind the critically acclaimed Alto’s Adventure series, Summerhill brings together gentle puzzles, striking pastoral landscapes and tranquil music to tell a timeless coming-of-age folktale.

Features:

  • Play as a young shepherd and their dog as you venture into the unknown to recover your lost flock.
  • Herd, split and corral your sheep through ancient contraptions to open hidden pathways and continue on your journey.
  • Forge a bond and work together with your dog to solve increasingly more complex puzzles.
  • Journey across an ancient, pastoral landscape and unearth the mysteries of its long-forgotten past.
  • Experience a timeless, wordless narrative interwoven with themes of duty, companionship, and morality.
  • Become immersed in a folk-inspired soundtrack by Todd Baker (Monument Valley, Dreams) that richly blends traditional influences from around the world into an ancient, transcendent soundscape.

About Land & Sea

Land & Sea is a small, independent games studio founded with the goal of creating artful, hand-crafted experiences that resonate with a wide audience. The studio is formed of the same BAFTA-nominated development team behind the critically acclaimed Alto’s Adventure & Alto’s Odyssey.
